listening.audio: How does life cycle assessment guide sustainable engineering decisions?
options: It evaluates environmental impacts from material extraction to end-of-life disposal
It focuses solely on energy consumption

listening.audio: What is the principle behind cradle-to-cradle design?
options: Materials continuously cycle without becoming waste, mimicking natural systems
Products are designed to break quickly
All materials end up in landfills

listening.audio: How does industrial symbiosis benefit participating organizations?
options: Waste from one organization becomes input for another, reducing costs and environmental impact
All organizations use the same materials
